title: Evergrey
description:
Description :
        "Danny, I have been waiting for my destined partner since I was young. Looking at the name written on my arm." Danny Choi (Choi Jeong-in), a piano teacher who moved to the small town of Edendale. Stanley Lee Stanley approaches him, saying that he has Danny's name. However, Danny, who is already raising a child alone, is not pleased with him...
